title: Is 5 lakhs worth it for pes or cet/comedk
content:
So they are asking 5 lakh for admission through. Is pes worth the 5 lakhs or should I go through kcet and comedk.
I am asking coz many 95+%ilers r choosing pes but wouldn't cet and comedk be better option
So shld I consider pes at 5lks or w8 for comedk and cet

comments.body: Pes does not accept COMEDK score …..if u have a good rank in cet then u can wait …..u can also just book this 5 lakh seat and if u end up getting through cet they will refund the difference

Depends on what options you can get through CET/ComedK.

IMO, 5L is a very high cost for a Bachelor's degree. But if you do not have any option which is similar to PES, you don't really have a choice.

Oh ok...thanks.but 5lks is a huge amount honestly lol.
Yes pes doesn't accept I meant others like msrit bms
I mean if ur sure that ull get through cet u can think of the 5 lakhs as backup ….it will only be a matter of few weeks before that amount gets refunded

U could try getting a seat through jee main and later if u get the same seat using kcet,they return the difference amount back (this was there in their email)

And for 5 lakh i think its little over the bar , but its in the silicon city and placements good too. So if u uv the money go for it.
not gonna lie but if you are getting colleges like msrit and bms through cet / comedk it's so much cheaper but its upto you at the end of the day
Yes that's what i was thinking. Thanks
What if got a seat in ec through jee but might get aiml through cet? It will still be refunded right?
no, not go for it, you can not justify 5 lakhs. any of the top 4 in bangalore will yield to a similar career path so if you're getting any of these thru kcet or comedk you should choose those.
comedk isn't accepted anymore its only through kcet / jee mains / management
I mean any good COMEDK colleges at this rank?
Ya they said they will in round 1 counselling. U can entirely choose a new seat
I don't think cse milega u can try for others
